title: Bug 114470 - Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
OB: The bug occurs when attempting to filter a table using the value new Date("3/2/2005").
EB: After saving and previewing the report, the expected result is that the filter works without errors. However, the actual result is that there are errors on the report page. The specific error message is: 'There are error(s) in Table: table8Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)) detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Can not convert it to Date. Can not convert it to Date.'
SR: To fix this bug, the table filter should be able to handle the value new Date("3/2/2005") without throwing an error.
